title: Paul Loesche Pianofabrik, Leipzig
medium: Pen and black and dark brown ink; gouache; graphite; collaged heavy cream wove paper on heavy cream wove paper
description: Preparatory design for a poster.  Plan of grand piano with keyboard at bottom.  Large grey "P" and white "L" arranged on piano top; PAUL / LO[with umlaut]SCHE in yellow in angle of "L"; "L" lays across piano keys.  The word "Pianofabrik" at lower left corner; "LEIPZIG" in orange patch adhered to lower left corners.  Ruled framing border.
name: Drawing
